entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
